channel.title: Manage your org with the Powershell CLI :: DevDocs Navigation Menu Test
channel.description: Manage your org with the Powershell CLI Click here to give feedback about this page About This Page Is this a new page?: Completely new doc with new content Target personas: WIC App Developer, Experienced IAM developer Changes to be made: Notes from conversation with Bhavik, Maurice and Dan: Doing a youtube about potential use cases. They have identified 525 custs using unofficial powershell cli. They are the target market. Target them in pendo in admin console - target them and notify them, Tell them Okta as a new powershell cli, Link to youtube podcast.
